docs.summary: Retrieves a post with the provided ID.

params.name: slug
params.doc: Slug of the post to retrieve.

docs.summary: Retrieves a post with the provided slug.
Retrieves the amount of published posts for the requested blog.

ret.doc: Get Blog Post Count Stats response

docs.summary:
Retrieves the number of posts per month published within a specified time span, from first day of a month - ignoring days value in period start field.
> Note: If `periodStart` value is set to `2018-11-10` and `months` value is set to `1`, the day value is ignored and statistic are returned for one month from `2018-11-01` until `2018-11-30`, and not between `2018-11-10` and `2018-12-10`.

Retrieves up to 100 posts, given the provided paging, filtering, and sorting.
To learn how to query posts, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-blog/blog/filter-and-sort).

One of:
NEWEST,
OLDEST,
UNKNOWN

members.name: rangeEnd
members.doc: Non-inclusive end of time range to return, in ISO 8601 date and time format.

members.name: rangeStart
members.doc: Start of time range to return, in ISO 8601 date and time format.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Timezone of the client

description: Get Blog Publications Count Stats request

members.name: stats
members.doc: Chronologically ordered list of publications.

description: Get Blog Publications Count Stats response

members.name: liked
members.doc: Is post liked by the current user

members.name: nofollow
members.doc: Indicates to search engine crawlers that the link should not be followed

members.name: sponsored
members.doc: Paid links

members.name: ugc
members.doc: UoU generated link

members.name: nodes
members.doc: List of nodes

members.name: settings
members.doc: SEO general settings.

members.name: tags
members.doc: SEO tags information.

description:
The SEO schema object contains data about different types of meta tags. It makes sure that the information about your page is presented properly to search engines.
The search engines use this information for ranking purposes, or to display snippets in the search results.
This data will override other sources of tags (for example patterns) and will be included in the <head> section of the HTML document, while not being displayed on the page itself.

members.name: preventAutoRedirect
members.doc: disable auto creation of 301 redirects on slug changes (enabled by default).

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order.
One of:
ASC,
DESC

members.name: children
members.doc: Tag inner content e.g. `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a custom tag.

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether the tag is disabled.

members.name: meta
members.doc: Tag meta data, e.g. {height: 300, width: 240}.

members.name: props
members.doc: SEO tag attributes/properties (name, content, rel, href).

members.name: type
members.doc: SEO tag type. Supported values: `title`, `meta`, `script`, `link`.

members.name: decorations
members.doc: List of decorations

members.name: text
members.doc: Textual data

members.name: lineHeight
members.doc: CSS value

members.name: textAlignment
members.doc:
One of:
AUTO,
CENTER,
JUSTIFY,
LEFT,
RIGHT

members.name: placement
members.doc:
One of:
BOTTOM,
LEFT,
NONE,
RIGHT,
TOP
